action.action-desc: Mr. Inhofe introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate the taxable income limit on percentage depletion for oil and natural gas produced from marginal properties.

section.header: Elimination of taxable income limit on percentage depletion for oil and natural gas produced from marginal properties

subsection.text: Subparagraph (H) of section 613A(c)(6) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended to read as follows:

subparagraph.header: Nonapplication of taxable income limit with respect to marginal production
subparagraph.text: The second sentence of subsection (a) of section 613 shall not apply to so much of the allowance for depletion as is determined under subparagraph (A).

subsection.text: The amendment made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2014.
